content.detailedDescription:
Date - 18th november 2005 
time - 19:22 
duration 30 seconds 
temperature - -2 degrees 
location - sunderland, uk 
shape of craft - 2 light balls or cigar craft 
direction coming from - east 
direction going to - west 
other aircraft around at the time - military jet before and after sighting. 
altitude - the height of a two story house 
size - the two balls of light were the size of two beach balls put together. 
short description - two balls of light seen flying (same height) at a low altitude. 

account of events - i was outside on the night of november the 18th i was sky watching i have been sky watching for nearly the hole month of november on the night i decided to do the watch not from the front of the house but in the back garden i took my usual equipment out with me and set up my things such as camera, torch etc��� and was ready to have a good sky watch. my friend was with me for about 30 minutes he saw a shooting star or a possible satellite fly across the sky he sighted this for about 3 seconds two days before i saw a very similar thing the night continued and we saw nothing else. my fried was then picked up by his parents at 19:00 on the night i went back to sky watch. i was watching for 15 minutes and recorded no events. but then at 19:23 i saw two lights fly across the sky i was in utter shock because the thing was so low in the sky it was only the height of a two story building it had not engine noise what so ever that is another thing that really startled me about it i watched for about 20 seconds as it flew past i quickly acted and ran down two stairs that leave off the patio and then i had to get up a flight of 8 stairs these are stairs because it is a house that was built on a slope so there are stairs down to the garden which is a very strange layout. i got up the stairs and got my camera ready i saw the two lights as it past out of sight behind a tree. there is a massive double gate at the top of the stairs and it is chained it is chained because we have recently been getting burglars attempting to get into the garage and steal like they are known to do i pulled endlessly on the chain but it was no use it just would not come on i am not sure if this is due to the cold temperature and the chain was stuck on by ice or frost or something along those lines but it would not come off. i ran down the stairs and round to the other set of stairs which is at the other side of the garden and is a very long way away i got up those stairs but when i got up the stairs there was nothing at all to be seen. but i am 100% sure this is a ufo it could not be identified i just do not know what the hell it could be. 

military fighter 

this is one thing that is really odd about the sighting i think the government could be chasing this thing as before the sighting i saw a military jet go over which is unusual for that time of night i heard the roar that fighters make and it flew overhead leaving a trail that fighters commonly made it had all red lights flashing and all the other lights were on and it went off into the distant in a southerly direction then a few minutes later was when i saw the ufo go toward the east then about 2 minutes after the sighting the fighter (possibly the same one) came back and went off to the east it think it was the same because it had all the same lights on it. so i think the government could have possibly been chasing this thing. 

i have attached a drawing of the ufo (picture 1)

and 

the location the ufo past (picture 2)

if anyone reading this wants to contact me about this please contact me at my web site - www.Samufofiles.Netfirms.Com
content.summary: Two balls of light could possibly of been a cigar craft flew past.

content.detailedDescription:
My late husband and i were coming home from supper in oxford when a bright light in the distance caught our eyes.  we didn't say anything at first because we thought it was merely an aircraft of some sort, but the light was so bright. the light seemed to have been several miles away then suddenly and unbelievably fast the object was within 100' from our car.  i almost hesitate to describe the object because it was so much like all the stories you hear of flying saucers but the craft seemed to be oval shaped and there were windows all the way around the side and you could see light inside the windows.  the bright light that we saw originally was coming from under the craft as it hovered beside our car. then in an instant, as quickly as it appeared, it dissapeared back over the horizon.  my husband and i were so shaken that we pulled the car over to discuss what we had just witnessed.  we both had seen the same thing but could not explain it. my husband and i are devowed christians and have no reason to fabricate such a story.  i would simply like to speak with someone with the hopes of better understanding what we saw that evening. what stands out in my mind so was the intensity of the light from beneath the craft, there is just no way to describe to you how bright it was.

thanks in advance,
*(wit's name removed--cms/sg).
content.summary: Bright light over horizon moved quickly to w/in 100' hovered momentarily then gone.

content.detailedDescription: 1.I was standing outside by the end of my garage. 2. it was a very bright white light. 3. a meteor 4. it was a very bright white light that came down at 45 degree angle, stopped, an made a right-hand turn (another 45 degree angle), and took off at a super high rate of speed. 5. it scared me, so i called the sheriff's department and reported it. 6. it moved so fast, i lost sight of it in just a second.
content.summary: A bright white light came down at a 45 degree angle, stopped, made a right-hand (45 degree) turn and took off at incredible speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was with one on my friends were neighbors. we were fishing on a nearby lake. while me and my friend were fishing on the lake we saw this thing come out of the sky it was a ufo. it was round and and wide on the top and got narrower going to the bottom it was round and narrow on the bottom and got wider going to the top it was wide and round on the top and got narrower going to the bottom it was round and narrow on the bottom it was red lighted and had white vertical lines all around it and on the middle of the top it had a yellow light and on the middle of the bottom it had a yellow light. the object was hovered over the lake and trees as we were fishing. it was very scary but we kept fishing and the object still was hovering over the lake. then we got our chairs and our fishing poles and went back to the car and we still saw the object and we watched it and then it disappeard. i have never been so scared. then we took our fishing poles me and my neighbor and then we dropped them off at our houses. and then we went to grab a bit to eat. this happened on june 7, 2005 on a tuesday night at 8:45 p.M. after we dropped our fishing poles off at our houses we went and ate at a mexican restaurant and then we checked in a motel room for a couple of nights. we stayed at the holiday inn in oklahoma city by airport and stayed a couple of nights. we checked in after we ate at a mexican restaurant. but when we were eating dinner and after we checked into the motel room we couldn't stop talking about the scary experience we had while we were fishing on the lake. it was very scary for both of us i have never been so scared in my life. it was a clear night outside and there was no sound to the object we saw when we were fishing out on the lake.
content.summary: While me and my friend were fishing on a lake we saw a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was preparing to jog on a country road in the horse heaven hills area. as i was first driving onto bentley road, i noticed what i thought was an incoming large plane coming towards me. i still had this idea after getting out of my car and walking towards it,though there was no sound at all. the road wove around at a downhill angle, so from this perspective it looked like a thin short cigarette. no movement, just hanging in the sky at a 45 degree cant. no colored lights or protrusions visible. it looked as though it were very high in the sky,maybe even in space. that day was probably the clearest of the summer, with no clouds,just blue sky. i just stood and watched it for about five minutes, when it suddenly just started to move away in a direction i can't really decide was east or west etc... not an instant burst of speed, but at a fair clip,never losing the cant. it basically just seemed to vanish at a far point in the sky. i continued on my jog,though i felt kind of vulnerable.
content.summary: Sighting of slender glowing white object in sky during mid-day.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my yard with a friend gazing at the blue sky and clouds as i usually do when i'm in my yard.All of a sudden i see what i think is a red party balloon.The big ones that get filled with hellium and sometimes get let go,and float in sky.Then i looked and thought again instantly and said to my friend,doesn't that look funny?And he instantl said it does,he was already getting nervous,shaking looking at it.Very smart fellow from africa.It seemed to have bolted in from a very far reach in space in less than a second.It like jammed it's brakes on and boppled and woppled.That's when i saw it.It was cylindrical(vertical)like the shape of the old outdoor water tanks,like to hold water on movie theatres to put out fires.The first thing that made me think it wasn't the balloon,was that i could see a railing and platform around it.When i saw that i looked further and saw round portholes,and peering out the portholes humanoids,standin tall(2).They set course,and blasted away.Friend said strange.We decided not to talk about it,but i'v always thought about it.Could have just seen what i wanted to see.
content.summary: Red object

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
The first time i noticed it was about midnight the morning of oct. 21 or 22 2005. i can't exactly remember because the event happens everynight. i was watching a movie downstairs in my basement and went to smoke a cig. i am a person who has also been interested in astronomy my entire life and am fascinated in the stars. as i gazed into the night sky, i noticed an unusually bright star in the sky. the star had a bright faintly blue band across it and a faintly visible, transparent halo around it. figuring it to be mars at first because i know that mars was the most visible planet in the sky at that time, i stared in wonder. then it came to me that mars appears almost dark orange. this was bright yellow with a faintly orange tint, and last i checked, doesn't have a band across it. so i started assuming saturn because jupiters ring isn't visible with the naked eye. then it wobbled and slightly dropped. stars nor planets descend in the night sky and wobble. i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me and rubbed them and began to look again. then when i compared it to the moon, it was lower. this thing was in the air. i refused to believe what i thought i was thinking so lit another cig and continued to observe. i noticed it was drifting and then it appeared to start a direct, very slow, almost unnoticable decent towards me and stop. 

i must say this.I am a former us marine. my mos was avionics technician f-18's. i have seen many different types of aircraft both military and civilian and none of them hover anything like this, and none are dead silent. they also have multiple lights that flash in an arranged pattern. this thing was bright, one solid color, silent, and the band i saw at first, is not a band. its extremities, but not wings. it also began to appear as either 2 seperate balls on top of each other joined by this blue colored now v shaped joint is the best way to describe it, or a longer type object. it was hard to distinguish because it would change slightly when it drifted to a slightly different position. it appeared to move in a manner to try to remain unnoticable, but i could tell. i went inside and grabbed my moms cell phone camera and went back outside and was suprised to see it there still, though it had shifted to a slightly different position but same general location. i struggled to snap off 2 different shots as it was very difficult to get it on the tiny little display, and i'm still not sure if i got it or not. after about an hour, i started second guessing myself and walked inside shaking my head almost laughing at myself that i even thought i saw what i think i saw. was i going crazy???
yeah, i must have been tired and my mind was playing tricks on me. after all, don't ufo's move really fast at odd flight patterns and only last a few seconds at best. they're also supposed to have lights and zip around and do neat little tricks. they also don"t start backing up when you aim a camera at it!!What do they care if you snap a few shots.

the next night, same day, i ate dinner and went outside again to smoke. i looked up to the same spot i had witnessed it the night before and of course i saw nothing. i began to laugh at myself at what i saw the night before. in geberal curiosity i thought, what the hell. i'll walk around my house while i smoke and just see. as i walked i a glimpse of a light the same color and brightness that i had seen the night before peering through a small gap in the top of the tree line to my left. it was dusk and still a little light remained. again as it had been that morning the sky was crystal clear. i moved further up my driveway thinking to myself that there was no possible way that i was seeing that thing again. i got to the front of my house and plain as day their it was, craddled between the bowl shaped gap in the tree line. now, i had a reference field to all but the top side and it sat directly in the center. it didn't take nearly as long to see it move this time as it had before. it was going left and right, up and down in a wobblly manner. i ran inside and got my parent to come out and see. sure enough, they both saw it. it wasn't making large movements, but very noticable comparing to the trees around it. then it moved up over the tree line and slightly left out of the clearing and continued to hover. it was at about a 45 degree angle and i assumed it to be about 20000 feet or so due to its size. i ran inside and grabbed the digital camera this time and my binoculars. i started to aim, but again had trouble getting it to show up on the display. so i just started to point and took a couple of guess shots. by this time it was dark, and stars had started to appear. i went in and downloaded this first batch to my comp. i was absolutly amazed at what came out. the picture resembled nothing like what i saw. the image was red and moving around very rapidly. you can tell because it resembled a still traffic shot. i thought that may have been the slight movement of my hand, but in a few of the other shots, there are 2 stars in the background, 1 blue, 1 green. i went back out and watched in disbelief and awe as i took a few more shots over the past hour and a half. again, it never left. i had called the nuforc and left a message and emailed them the pics.

the next day, i got call from them. this was a monday. the so called scientist that spoke to me insisted it was mars and hadn't even looked at my pictures. he had a bad attitude and completly blew me off belittling me the entire time. i wanted to say something really bad but he hung up before i could retort.

ok. thats the beginning of a very long story that grows day by day for almost a month now, non stop, every night, all night. from sun down till i don't know how long, assuming sun up. brief summery of things since.As i have taken more pics (over 200) and watched, now i have a telescope, i have been able to detect many other things going on. theres more than 1 in the sky. there is a peremeter. they post in different positions and no matter where i go on my property, which is about 2 acres that is very open then extends into a fence of thin woods, neighborhoods around at a distance, a dark sky, and road that brdges 2 kinda busy roads about 5 miles from the interstate that gets dead at night. in some of the pics, you can see orbs as well as the objects being photographed. you can tell they are 3-d and have indentions. i discovered them by mistake as they are invisible (or were to me until now) when i looked at one of the pics i took by mistake when i couldn't get the camera to flash and began to point it at a differnt spot and it went off. this pics is one of my favorites. they look like the diagrams of cells you see in biology books and it even appears that they are splitting! there tons of them and they where all around me!! i had no clue. i can see them now, but they appear as just circles in which the area i see them is slightly fainter and distorted compared to the rest of the sky. i see many shadows that buzz past and flashes that shot by. i have pictures of this too. sometimes i can see what looks like a tiny diamond that sparkles very sharply just in the air no more than 10 feet away and at sternum level with me. whenever i stare at that and take my focus off the surrounding area, i can see a figure that looks like the shape of a small human. this is not like the typical description of the greys that i have heard so much about. they are about 4 feet tall, some shorter than others, and they will not approach me. if i get closer than a few steps towards it, it vanishes like it just fades into the area behind it like a chammeleons blends in with the color of its surroundings, but when i step back, reappears. these are very real beings that have the technology or ability to do this, like camoflouge. there heads are properly proportioned to there bodies, and there eyes are black, but not as slit as they are oval and on towards the top of there head, like a bug almost, but human. also the very top of there eyes appear slightly reflect light like a pair of sunglasses has that tiny bright spot where the sun reflects off. they observe every move i make and are everywhere i am at night, and can point them out to anybody, at least the crafts that i think are more or less personal transport units.They have no facial features other than eyes and almost look like kermit the frog in the face. i have a picture of this as well that i took inside my house looking out because the first time i thought i trully saw it it looked liked something was peering through my window, and more than one. i had very mixed emotions about the pic because i tried to regard the images i saw as reflections of like out the window. but i showed it to several people and my best friends who lived with me for a week and saw almost everything i saw, and still can like me, though he is in the mountains, have concluded that the images are real. this was primarily based on comparing the shots we took in my jeep when we got some daylight pics in the subdivision down by my house. when we left we got on the interstate and took some shots while in motion and window up in a few and only got 1 flash with no images of kermit looking creatures peering back. i must correct myself. in the picture with the image, there are 2. one right at my window peering from through the bottom, with a reflective flash off its peeering eyes, and another image in the back to the right that had very serious eyes that were slightly more slanted and slit and looked more like it was watching the other figure like a boss observes his subordinate.

there ones in the woods that look exactly like the watcher one in the air as i first decribed from day 1, but they seem to have a different task. they analyze, everything. study everything around them to the last detail with what looks just like a double lens laser pointer that emits either 1 or 2 either red or white dots on whatever it is looking at, including you! i have watched them before and seen the dots appear on me. they stay back and do their own thing, almost always in the same spot just floating slightly around. i have now noticed in the past 2 days a different one. this character at first looked like a a small cloud with whitish yellow sparkles. when i got a good look at it with binoculars in tree line gaps, i can tell it has a definite shape, like a human wearing buffy clothes, and the sparkles dont sparkle but are a constants glow placed in very specific places and when they appear to move very wildly about it, that it it moving that part of it body. he seems to be top dog because he points his little beams at the other guys and they react. also, when i stare at him for more than a few seconds with binoculars, those little dots start appearing on me. i also feel things start to get all around me and get what feels like a forced sense of overwhelming paranoia. thats when i also see the figures that i mentioned earlier that at first look like floating diamonds. i need to get a picture of him, need a new chip for digital camera cuz my other one is loaded up. they really got pissed when i pointed my telescope at him. i decided that might not be a good idea, and took it back in until i can asses that a little better.

i at first wanted to remain unanimous, but after emailing coast to coast, and oops, the cia, about this matter, in which that was a while back and far less detailed, and no response from anybody, i want to get into this field and research the hell out of it.Especially because since i informed the cia, you can't go more than 1 second without seeing either an f-18, i know them from the bottom and light patterns because i worked on them, recon plane with its spotter lights for taking nighttime aerial photos, a helocopter or some other military aircrafts like those used by the fbi or dea to watch people from above, and most of the time they fly at very low altitudes and very slowly over my house.

this is not a joke. i would like from somebody to please at least look at these pics. you can send an investigator out to my house if you wish any night you choose and you will see i'm very serious about this. i have nowhere else to turn. i had given up actually until i saw your web sight. i have been thing very extensivly about creating an organizations that follows up on these kind of reports that everybody, including so called ufoologist such as the one that didn't even give me the time of day despite the fact i have many pictures, yet goes off claims in which no evidence other than a single persons testimony is provided. that just blows my mind and makes me think no wonder why we can't publically prove life exists outside this planet.I have come to the conclusion that the government not only knows about these occurances, but will not do anything about it except do anything they can to deny it and discredit or shut up those who can prove it. it will be up to us, as citizens, to stand up to this. it will take undenialble proof and i want to get as involved as i can in the field as humanly possible after exeriencing this.

content.summary: Bright light that hovers. all night, every night, on going, several visible in the air, transparent orbs on the ground many pictures to support.Have brought several people from work, brother, parents and my best friend who lived with me for a week.

content.detailedDescription: The witness said she saw at 3:00 a.M. aproximately a briht light in the vicinity of orion.  the light was steady, not twinkling.She thought it might be a planet.  intermittently around the stationary light would appear other lights flashing on and off one at a time. described as disappearing and reappearing elsewhere.  witness sketched the constellation orion from memory and placed the light above sirius about fifteen degrees virtually directly above. this sighting lasted for about five minutes.  her husband witnessed the event as well although he did not see the same thing. he denied seeing the intermittent lights. the lights simply faded after a while. no special reaction was elicited from the witness other than wonder.
content.summary: Witness saw a bright light east of orion. no twinkling. intermittent lights flashed around the object. lights would last less than a second. if she blinked she would miss it.  husband also present  but did not see the same thing.

content.detailedDescription:
Was in my bedroom window checking the weather.
at first i thought it was an airplane, then it was moving  strangely as if coming towards me. and there was one light only, then, i decided to take a picture, as i have had insidents that i firmily belive to have been abducted, but every one just say i was dreaming and i have a big imagination.I know they were not imaginatuions, but ??
i was curious, then as it moved fast and desappered i was stunned and may be scared, but still even more curious , now i saw it when i was awake, not sleeping or had been sleeping.
i just want to meet them, and see with my own eyes that i don't just have a vivid imagination.
my first abdauction was when i was 13, i have been *taken*??At lest 4 times that i remember, the evens are alway similar, but only the first time i was really frighted, and not the last time but the one before someone famous was interviewd a few months after the even saing that he had been taken, and this oerson was in my *dream*??
he described similar things as i saw it happened. it is all far too strange for me not to belive, so i hope you see my point in desperetly wanting to find out more and the truth about it all.
all i know is waht i feel about them, and it is not fear, they are her to teach and help us learn. we are experiments or even hope for them.
some how, i don't seem to be of any use to them now, may be a, too old or have leard my lesson, or what ever they want i may not bre able to provide anymore or even have taught them what i could.
if you have any advice i'd be happy to have it.
thank for your time.
mel xxx by the way now i am over 40 not a kid joking ok....
content.summary: A light that seemed to go slowly and then just dashed off into the sky. ??? scary.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking with "mr. green" towards a local shop in the suburbs of trondheim. we were talking.
the thing that made me notice the object, is that it "flared"/came into my field of view.
i first thought the object was an afterburner on a jet, or the reflection off a polished aluminium aircraft.
then i remembered that it had no sound, and that all aircraft are painted, and not polished aluminium.
the light was just sitting there in the sky, "flaring" and changing shape. it looked just like regulare sunlight, but the sun was off to our right.
i talked to "mr. green" who was also watching the object, and asked him what he thought it could be. he said "no idea" and told me he wondered what it could be too.
we had both stopped walking at this point, and stood and watched the light.
how did i loose sight of the object: it looked like it "burned out" after first flaring up.
content.summary: Flexing light in the sky, seemed to be reflected off a surface, but no object seen

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on a mound near my summer cabin. i was walking my pet cat by a leash.
what made me first notice the object, was that it was "bobbing" up and down, and coming up from the forest below the mound i was standing on, and came into my range of vision.
when i first saw the object, i thought it was the tail of some animal with a white spot on the tail.
the object then went up to a tree, and suddenly "jumped" up on a branch about 2 meters above the ground, and settled there. at this point i heard a "laughter", like a cackling loud laughter coming from its direction. i then thought it was a bird with a white spot on it.
then i witnessed the branch it was "sitting" on, breaking off at its base, and the thing was still sitting there.
then i got kind of scared.
that was when i realized that it was just a sphere of white fur-like consistency, but the reason i say fur, is that it was "fuzzy" and unsharp to look at. it could just have been light, like a white ball-lightning.
then, the object paused for a few seconds, and shot off out across the nearby lake and disappeared from my view due to being so small that i could not see it anymore at the distance it reached in a matter of seconds. this is how i lost sight of it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: White "fuzzball" with sound and physical interaction with environment

content.detailedDescription: I'm not really sure how to ask this, but i was just curious about a scoop i have on my lower right inside ankle.  i've always been curious about it , i asked my father and mother and they have no idea how i got it.  i thought maybe it was an injury when i was young, but they said no they would know if i had an injury like that.  it's the size of a dime.  i never noticed it before 1962 and i always have a weird sensation when i concentrate on it (to see if i can remember how i got it).  how can my parents not know how i got a scar like that.  i was the first born and they were very protective of me, and how can i not remember how i got it?  i've heard stories about how people noticed scars or markings on their bodies and not know where they came from.  is it nothing or should i keep on trying to remember how i got it.  i always feel i'm being watched and i have the most vivid dreams, am i a psycho?  i've always been a loner and i keep to myself, i get premonitions at times that scare me, and the older i get the stranger i feel. help..
content.summary: Don't know

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)

content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile

content.detailedDescription:
Peter my friend and i are driving from a high school play/performance to go home, we notice what looks like lights on a radio tower only they are different, brighter, and appeared to be moving at the same rate we were along the roadside above the tree line at about 300 feet. i asked peter if he sees what i see and he too confirmed that it was really happening before our eyes. there were 3 vertical white/amberish lights with a weird cloud like fog or glow below them. they are moving a bit faster than we are at about 35 m.P.H. or so until we come to a stoplight. the 3 lights begin to morph or compress into 2 lights then 1 light, still with this weird foggy glow below them. the glow was constant until the 3 lights became 1 light then the glow surrounded the light & faded away. the center light became very small and looked exactly like a star and it stopped moving. we commented on how clever this seemed because it truly modelled itself to blend right in with the other stars in the sky. we kept our eyes on it, exhilarated at what we both were witnessing together. just then a much bigger glow appeared around the star and a much bigger elliptical 45degree angle glow also faded into view, it was huge, it took up our entire field of view through the front windshield. the glows all appeared to me like an aurora borealis kind of plasma energy, it took on a slightly bluish tint. our light signal turns green and we turn left heading east on sumpter rd..Then the star became much brighter and began to expand and split just like a cell does when it grows under a microscope. it split into two symmetrical distinct balls of light with these outer ring glows, we were really getting excited about what we are witnessing and i pull the car over to get a better look, just as we slow to a stop, the glows and lights expand at the same rate a firework display does, only it stays perfectly symmetrical in it���s expansion. we can see streaks inside of the plasma ball glow, that squiggle and move a bit like electricity. we are both gasping and our expressions are pretty hilarious as we are oh, my god���ing and , what the #@!% is that. then the entire formation imploded or shrank an a fraction of a second and simply vanished!
no trace after 1/2 second. it simply vanished. we both had goosebumps from head to toe and were astonished at how big this was for us, and how long event took right near a busy intersection prime time on a friday night. many cars were around us and driving, i choose to know if they were looking up and saw it. surely as big as this was somebody else must have seen it too.  this is an experience that confirmed for me what i felt in my heart. we are being visited by other worldly energies, and or craft. no scientific explanation can begin to explain what this was. whatever it was... it truly was in and then out of this world, in less than a second!

we called people we knew from the school and heard that many of the students and families leaving the event also witnessed the event, and they told us the consensus was it was the space shuttle. to which we thought was ridiculous, but hey as bizzare and life altering this was for me, i can imagine that people would try to rationalize and justify such an amazing phenomena.

i am a graphic designer and immediately came home with my friend peter and recreated in photoshop exactly what we saw and the timings it happened in so we would verify and validatebetween the two of us the accuracy of our event. we showed it to our family and a few friends, and then put it aside. i felt it was time to share it. i recently edited the images into a video sequence so the effect could be witnessed in realtime the way we saw it.
content.summary: Multiple stacked lights morph into star, create aurora effect, then expand into huge ball and then vanishes in a split second.

content.detailedDescription: Stacy mcglammery and i were lying on the beach looking at stars,as it was a pretty,clear night; it "flew" directly overhead about 350ft above us;moving north to south at about 35mph ;we at first thought it was a hang glider but quickly saw it "reveal" itself into a distinct object that had an inner glow of unearthly color and characteristics that are too strange to describe in a few words,but it looked "alive". it remained in 100% form for a few seconds,then "blurred" away just as it had become definative,and vanished .No sound.It has changed my life.Called the radio station for other possible witnesses,they made a joke about it.We were 100% sober/aware
content.summary: It changed form in flight  as if it became "uncloaked";40ft x 20ft.,from blurry to distinct to blurry,then dissappeared.Unearthly color,it looked alive,it was close to us. we got a good look!

content.detailedDescription:
I always take photos of clouds especially before a storm. i went out with my son and started snapping photos of the sky at random and even said "bet when we look at these on the pc there will be ufos in them again" and we both laughed. the reason i said that was this has happened several times, take photos and later discover ufos in them.
 
i took these photos the day before the tornado hit evansville, in and killed 22 people, seems there is always strange things in the sky before big storms.
 
i took about 7 photos of the sky and this is the only 3 i found things in, there are several pics in between these that i don't see anything unusual in, if you would like them to compare ill be glad to send them also.
 
i thought maybe these were birds of some sort but after looking hard i came to the conclusion that if they are they have to be huge.
 
i took all the photos one right after the other and find it strange nothing was in the other photos. thx for looking at these and if you have any clue what these are plz let me know.
content.summary: Unknown things flying with storm clouds.............

content.detailedDescription: My son (age 13) and i were driving home from the grocery store. it was dark out. my son looked out his window and asked me if i knew what it was he was seeing in the sky.  i looked, and could not identify it.  it was very large, too large to be an airplane, especially with no big airports in the area.  it was not moving and there was no noise.  the center light looked larger, or possibly the craft was curved, bent etc? we observed it briefly, about 15 seconds...Then drove by an enbankment where we couldn't see it until we passed by the enbankment.  then i looked again and saw it, turned back to driving, while my son was watching it the entire time.  then it disappeared while he was watching it.  i looked again also and it was gone.  the entire experience was probably less than a minute.
content.summary: Series of large bright lights in the sky, not moving, no noise, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: A fast decent of a bright light from the sky. could have been a falling star.  i have never seen something so bright and fall so fast in my 50 years of living in los angeles. my sister & i were driving west bound on the 91 getting onto the 110 south. my husband & son in another car also caught a glims of the light.  i found nothing on any web site. maybe too soon for reports to come in.

Driving home from visit to florida and a neon blue oval shaped "thing" was in front of the car (can't guess the distance, maybe the size of a couple of cars smashed together) all of a sudden and then went out of eyeshot over the roof of the car. it shocked me and i was in a daze. i hit my husband who was sleeping in the passenger side of the car in the chest with the back of my hand and pulled off at the next exit, which wasn't even lit up. there are so many things i wish i would have done differently. i wish i would have woke my husband up because the whole thing lasted 15 to 30 seconds. i wish i would have stopped the car right then. but i was dumbfounded and speachless. to intent on paying attention than anything. i called the cops from that county and when i got home the next morning ( i used to live in tennessee ) and asked if anything had been reported and kind of described what i saw, though i didn't call it a ufo or whatever. they were very nice, didn't act surprized but said no one had called in. i don't really share this info although i did one time with my father-in-law a couple of months later. he said at first he thought i was crazy until i described the color and shape. someone he once worked with had described the same thing.
content.summary: Driving north on i-75 in middle georgia

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was on my deck having an after dinner cigarette.
2.  i live under the departure leg for columbus metro so i always watch the departing aircraft.  i first noticed the sound, before i could see the lights.  it sounded like a heavy (jet turbine at low rpm) but our airport only supports up to a 737, so i figured maybe a c17 or 141 out of fort benning.
3.  as the aircraft approached, i thought that was too low (2000-2500 ft.) for a heavy.  also too slow, maybe 160-200kt.  as i made out a triangle shape i thought maybe a b2.  as it got closer i saw it was smaller, so maybe a f117, but i've seen those at airshows, and you don't hear them coming like this.
4.  the two objects flew directly overhead, silhouetted against a clear sky.  they were in conventional formation, ie: wingman trailing port. the shape was close to an equilateral triangle.  the nose had a white strobe, and perhaps a static white too(?), port corner red strobe, starboard green strobe.  i focussed on the trailing edge: it was solid straight.  this was not a 117 or b2.
5.  i went in and told a relative (who worked in the aviation engine industry) what i saw.  he joined me on the deck and 8 minutes later one similar (or one of the same) aircraft flew the same heading (approx. 330 no deviation or unconventional mannerisms) over our heads.  he couldn't identify the sound of the powerplant, and commented that it had an unusual lighting configuration.  we both looked at the trailing edge and agreed this was not a 117 or b2. both he and i are aviation buffs, and have built plastic models of most types.  i have a good background in flight simulation, so i think my guesstimates are informed.  i have no doubt this was a conventional aircraft, but am unable to name it. best wishes.
content.summary: 2 black triangles overflight, then one bt 8 minutes later

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed at a school campout.I first noticed it when i saw a bright spotlightlike light sweeped my tent. when i first saw it i knew it was a ufo. the object was a large bright orange disk with spotlightlike lights at treetop alitude,and it just flew by. my reactions were i needed to get out of bed and see what it was, but i couldn't because i would wake up the other person in my tent. after it flew it crashed in the woods next to our tent.
content.summary: Large bright orange disk with spotlightlike lights flying at treetop alitude.

content.detailedDescription:
Well, i was driving down rte. 96 from manns choice pa crossing the shawnee lake. i pulled over to make a call and was getting ready to get on my way. i happened to take a minute to observe the beautiful clear night and see mars.  well i happened to look over the mill road area of schellsbrug to see if i could see my friend's house.  it's also where i happen to work too.  well, i happen to notice this large round object flying very low moving slowly and stopping occasionally. it was very bright and was pulsating from yellow to white light.  we have airplanes go by but they're small private planes from the small town airport.   this was flying even lower than that.  any commercial airliners fly over at an extremely high 
altitude. i slos got out of my car to really check it out and noticed there was absolutely no sound.  everytime a planes comes over whether it be small and local or one of those big ones at 35,000 feet.  you can always hear them.  i thought it was rather strange.  all of a sudden it looked like some kind of rocket booster went off and it took off at an extremely high speed in a westerly direction until it just dissappeared.  i have have since gone on line and found out that a similiar sighting was spotted in harrisburg two hours west of us at 9:30pm.  i suppose that the athorities wiil say it was a weather balloon.  or sme kind of gas.  pardon my expression but that is alot of hogwash. i'm sure that the officials will say that it isn't real just like roswell huh!!!!
content.summary: Round and about the size of golfball at arms length. pulsating colors of whit e and yellow  and when it took off at  a high rate of speed it looked like a rocket boooster on it

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in co. talking on the phone with my daughter who lives in delray beach florida. she was sitting outside looking up into the sky as we often "moon-watch" together from our different locations....She exclaimed to me as she saw 3 lights in a trialgular shape move across the darkness and vanish into a thick cloud. that's about it -she was amazed and was glad i was on the phone with her at the time! i wish i had been there to witness this, too! she was less than 1 mile west of the beach, on atlantic ave.
content.summary: My daughter, in florida at the time ,witnessed this event!

content.detailedDescription: I was waching t.V. at my house and i saw a bright light.I thought it was a weather balloon. it moved very fast and it made me freaze.Then , it dissapeared at light speed.
content.summary: It was very bright.

content.detailedDescription:
Woke up in the early to check the dogs. noticed object in the southern sky very bright red & blue lights turning.
i thought the object was a ufo when i first noticed it.
object lights were flickering (red & blue) and turning, hovering over the lower southern sky. at first very bright, then started to fade into the distance and get close again the over the course of about an hour it gradually moved to the west and it suddenly dissapeared.
very excited and, to see an object, woke up husband to observe too, after, dissapointed we did not have time to capture a picture.
watched the object through binoculars most of the time, last sight through the binoculars object suddenly left.
did manage to take a picture with a small digital camera but, un fortunately it doesn't show nothing?

content.summary: Flying lights on orange disk very bright

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on a straight road eastward on us hiway 12, alone on a dark moonless evening, about 10 miles east of miles city, montana at 80 mph when i suddenly noticed two intense white lights flashing in front and to the left of my car at the 11 o'clock position about 15 ft in front of my car. the lower light was about 15 ft above ground and there was another light directly above the lower light by about 10 ft. both lights were the same intensity and brighter than car headlights, though smaller and had a distinct diamond shape with sharp edges. the vertical diameter was about 3 in. and the horizontal dia. about 2 in. they were flashing in unison at intervals of about 1.5 seconds. they made no sound. it was clear that there was no craft involved and no physical connection between the lights was observed. over the following 10 seconds the lights moved first directly in front of my car and then to my right (south) to the 2 o'clock position, still about 15 ft away, still flashing in unison, vertical elevation unchanged. the lights were apparently moving at the same speed i was, i.E., 80 mph. as the lights drifted toward the 3 o'clock position over the next 30 seconds, i slowed the car and then stopped at a wide spot on the right side of the road. i got out of the car and viewed the lights, now stationary but still flashing at the same interval and still about 15 ft away from me. the lower light, about 15 ft above ground, was at the same height as the telephone or electrical wires on that side (the right side) of the road. indeed, the lower light appeared to be directly on the wires, though i could not be sure. it could have been either a few ft behind or in front of the wires. i continued to watch the blinking lights without changing frequency, size, brightness or position for about 3 minutes. i then got into my car and drove away. i could see the lights blinking in the rearview mirror, still apparently stationary, until i rounded a curve which obscured my view. 

my reaction to the lights was intense intellectual interest (i am a mufon field investigator for the state of minnesota) but i remained calm and felt no physical sensations. 

the most obvious mundane explanation is an electrical discharge of some sort from the wires. however, such discharges are normally irregular in frequency and are audible. this hypothesis would not explain the source of the lights while they were to the left of the road (where there were no wires) or while they were directly in front of me moving to my right, while i was moving at 80 mph. 

the object remains unidentified.
content.summary: Two bright lights separated vertically by 12 ft,  flashing at 1.5  sec freq. over  wires, diamond shape

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on 287 between the montville and route 23 exits and was in the middle lane. it was a little after 8:30 at night. there were only a few cars on my side of the highway. none was immediately next to or before me. i saw a very, very bright ball of light in the sky ahead, over the highway. it appeared to be about a mile ahead when i noticed it. it was at the height a helicopter might fly. my first thought was that it didn't look right. the ball appeared to have two small wings coming out of the sides. it was bigger than a private plane.  as i drove closer i kept expecting the ball to resolve into the shape of a plane. it did not, and i realized that the craft was stationary. as i drove near it, i saw that the base looked like a flat triangular surface, with the point facing toward me. the underside of the base was dotted with little lights. as i was driving under it, i looked up at it. the lights went out suddenly and then a new pattern of lights came on. these were little dots of light green lights along the underside of the base that outlined the triangular shape. there were also a few dots within the triangle. as i drove away i tried to look for the craft in my rear view mirror but could not see it. within two or three minutes i turned off 287 onto route 23 north, which runs perpendicular to 287 and is elevated above it. i looked down 287, at the direction from which i had come. there was nothing in the sky over the highway. i looked to the right and left of the highway and saw nothing in the sky there, either.
content.summary: Motionless craft with triangular base and bright white lights hovered over route 287; lights on bottom changed to green dots outlining the base

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my home in a subdivision on the nw side of ft walton beach at 1840l, when my two sons came in and excitedly told me to come out in the street and see the lights in the sky.  i went running out with them, and my oldest son (the first to spot the objects) pointed almost due west.  this was approx 1hr20 mins after sunset and by then the w sky was totally dark.  the objects in question could best be described as five independent bright, steady lights of an amber hue.  when i saw them, they'd already taken up a "w" formation from our perspective (three in the top row, evenly spaced and parallel to the ground, two in a lower row, evenly spaced, parallel to the ground.) i estimated their distance at 15 miles away, at an angle of aprox 25 degrees inclination up from the horizon.  distance estimate is best guess, since they were bright lights against a dark sky, so nothing to help judge.  the "w" formation covered a good 35-degree arc horizontally, so the formation, while clear, was not what we in military aviation would consider a "close" formation.
my sons told me they spotted it as soon as they turned into the subdivision; that street is e-w oriented, so therefore has the best view of the w sky w/out trees or houses blocking view.  after watching it for a couple minutes (the "w" formation hung in the sky as if it were a giant, much brighter version of the "w" in the constellation cassiopia), i remembered my video camera and ran back in to retrieve it.  one of my other sons went to get our next door neighbor (also retired air force), and we got back out on the street almost simultaneously.  while the neighbor and others watched, i fired up the video camera, only to watch it die repeatedly due to low battery charge.  frustrated, i stood w/the group (which now included other neighbors coming out of their homes) for several more minutes.  at one point, the anti-collision strobe and running lights of a small civilian aircraft appeared to approach the formation of lights from the n, then turned away and circled for a couple minutes before departing the area. from our perspective, i believe the small airplane was much closer to our position than the bright lights.  no engine sounds were heard from either the small plane or the bright lights, which is one reason i believe the lights were more distant (somewhere over central santa rosa county. after about 5 minutes, the lights independently and slowly broke formation, one by one, starting w/the furthest right or northern light.  there was nothing odd about their separation, until we noticed that as each one broke formation, they moved down visibly, then after 2-3 seconds, would just vanish.  from the time my oldest son, 19, first viewed the lights until the last of the five vanished, approximately 10 mins elapsed. at that point, my neighbor suggested maybe they were helos (we live adjacent to hurlburt field, home to usaf special operations.) as a retired usaf special operations flyer, i challenged his theory based on the angle and distance - they'd be pretty high in altitude.  plus, it's very rare for hurlburt to launch five mh-53's at once for a night training mission (usually no more than 2-3 at a time.) once they vanished, we all went back inside, and i didn't think much more about it as we were awaiting guests for a monday night football party.  the next day, i heard people calling in to a local radio station and discussing the lights in the sky, so i contacted some of my active-duty friends and had them check local flight and military range schedules.  the results came back negative.  there were no military aircraft up and operating at that time over the western ranges of the eglin military reservation.  also checked w/both navy and army contacts, and ditto.  since then i've spoken w/several others who also witnessed the bright lights in the sky monday night.  as a retired special ops aviator w/nearly 5,000 hrs in the air, i'm very familiar w/seeing other aircraft in the night skies, especially in our area of heavy training ops.  these bright lights defied anything i've ever seen, and altho i tried to assign several normal explanations, none of "the usual suspects" held up under scrutiny.  i and other witnesses of these lights are fairly certain these were not caused by any normal explanation.  unfortunately, i can't offer any visual evidence as my video camera was low on batteries.  i really, really regret that!  feel free to contact me if any further questions.
content.summary: Five bright lights in sky evenly spaced; took up "w" formation, remained motionless at least 5 mins, then turned, departed independently; est dist 15 miles
